featured.text: According to the passage, which of the following statements is true? (A) Wetas are unpleasant to the eye.

definition.zh_def: 一種大型的、夜行性的昆蟲，主要分布在紐西蘭，屬於直翅目。
definition.en_def: A large, nocturnal insect native to New Zealand, belonging to the order Orthoptera.
definition.example: Wetas are known for their impressive size and unique appearance.
